  • create module

create module¶

This module allows interaction with files to merge them into an APNG.

This module can be run as the primary file, or called from another.

Contains:

  • verify_image()

  • make_apng()

create.VALID_IMAGES = ('.png', '.jpg')¶

File extensions of valid images to use.

create.make_apng(frame1=None, frame2=None, filename=None)¶

Creates APNG from parameters. If parameters not given, will prompt user to input them at runtime.

Parameters

  • frame1 (str) – the path to the image for frame 1

  • frame2 (str) – the path to the image for frame 2

  • filename (str) – the name of the PNG file to be created

Returns

True if PNG file created, else False

Return type

bool

create.verify_image(img, size=None)¶

Checks if a path leads to an image suitable for the APNG.

Parameters

  • img (str) – path to check

  • size ((int, int)) – size to enforce

Returns

True if path leads to suitable image, else False

Return type

bool
